targets.query: SELECT date, sumIf(issue_count, severity='error') as errors, sumIf(issue_count, severity='warning') as warnings FROM market_intelligence.mv_dq_issues_daily WHERE date >= today() - 30 GROUP BY date ORDER BY date
SELECT date, source, avg(score) FROM market_intelligence.data_quality_scores WHERE date >= today() - 30 GROUP BY date, source ORDER BY date
